title: The Happy Revolution (New Methods in Primary Eduction)
creator_credit: Robert Tyrrell and Central Office of Information
brief_description: A new approach to British primary education which is being debated and developed. Pupils’ minds are being opened to new worlds of ideas and experience. Children are being encouraged to find out things for themselves; through observation and exchange of ideas, but literacy is still the key to everything.
